title: dunkmaster darius chroma doesnt show yellow passive effect.
body:
it kinda pisses me off that i bought this skin and chroma jjust to see the color red instead of the yellow.
alsoo if this is a legendery skin,can u make the color effect look like the chroma color? lets say the pink darius gets the pink 5 stack effect?

replies.body:
Hey korenyaminiskoks - 

All chromas use the parent skin's particles. So, in this case, regardless of chroma, you're going to be using Dunkmaster Darius' original particles. At this time, we don't have plans to change particles for a chroma, regardless of skin tier.
